META.TITLE: Roommates next door - Fluster
META.DESCRIPTION: Are you looking for rooms to let or roommates? Uses the Fluster application. Discover Fluster and find the rooms to rent or roommates of your dreams, download the free application now!

SELECT_ATTRIBUTES.FLATMATE_TEXT: How many persons will live in your shared flat?

TEXT.MORE: To send a viewing request and to discover more details, view this opportunity in our mobile app

SOCIAL.DOWNLOAD: Our app is available for iOS and Android, download it now

VIEWINGS.TITLE: Manage your viewings
VIEWINGS.CONTENT: Fluster take care of the calendar of your viewings

POST.TITLE: Advertise your room to let for free
POST.CONTENT: Publishing an ad has never been easier

FILTER.TITLE: Filter your candidates
FILTER.CONTENT: Fluster allows you to filter and select candidates that match your interests

ALL.TITLE: One-stop shop
ALL.CONTENT: Rooms, viewings, agenda, messages, notifications, etc. Fluster offers you all the services you need

FIND.TITLE: Find your new roommate
FIND.CONTENT: Discover who is looking for a shared flat like yours

DISCOVER.TITLE: Discover rooms to let
DISCOVER.CONTENT: Fluster recommends you rooms to let fitting your needs

VIEWINGS.TITLE: Save time
VIEWINGS.CONTENT: You like a place on Fluster? Send an instant viewing requests!

INTERESTS.TITLE: Lifestyle & hobbies
INTERESTS.CONTENT: Discover what are the interests of your future roommates

FREE.TITLE: Fluster is for free
FREE.CONTENT: Wether you are an advertiser or looking for a new place, Fluster is for free

TEAM.DAVID_DESCRIPTION: Hey, I'm David, the founder and developer of Fluster. I created my platform because I was struggling finding a new home and roommates when I moved to ZÃ¼rich. I hope Fluster will help you in your quest!
